title: Global yogurt market value forecast 2019 to 2024
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic depicts the Market value of Global from 2019 to 2024 , according to the Market Finance valuation methodology .
The ranking , provided by The Banker Magazine , is an independent , publicly reported measure of the strength of a Market and its impact across all business lines and customer groups .
In 2024 , the Market value of Global was valued at 106.6 billion U.S. dollars and the bank was ranked third in its peer group .
